run_as.mean: run tests sequential by iterations and in parallel inside iterations with degree of parallelism equal tests count. (lightweight ZIO fibers)
run tests parallel with degree of parallelism equal tests count * itercount. (lightweight ZIO fibers)
run all iterations in parallel and inside iteration test running sequential.
run all iterations in parallel and inside iteration tests also in parallel.

description.repeat: Count of iteration test running in general.
description.qtimeoutms: Global timeout in milliseconds that will be used for each query.
